title: Child grazed by bullet in Price Hill
content:
CINCINNATI —
A 26-year-old man was arrested after a little girl was grazed by a bullet early Saturday morning in Price Hill, authorities said.
The incident happened shortly after midnight in the 4700 block of Guerley Road.
Rodney Williams was charged with negligent assault. He told investigators he was cleaning a gun, a Glock 22C, when it fired accidentally, police said.
The bullet grazed the girl’s back, which required stitches. The girl’s family said she was OK after staying overnight at Children’s Hospital.
